00049 struct PxHeightFieldMaterial
00050 {
00051     enum Enum
00052     {
00053         eHOLE = 127, 
00054     };

00056 
00068 struct PxHeightFieldSample
00069 {
00077     PxI16           height;
00078 
00094     PxBitAndByte    materialIndex0;
00095 
00096     PX_CUDA_CALLABLE PX_FORCE_INLINE    PxU8    tessFlag()  const   { return materialIndex0.isBitSet() ? 1 : 0;     }   // PT: explicit conversion to make sure we don't break the code
00097     PX_CUDA_CALLABLE PX_FORCE_INLINE    void    setTessFlag()       { materialIndex0.setBit();                      }
00098     PX_CUDA_CALLABLE PX_FORCE_INLINE    void    clearTessFlag()     { materialIndex0.clearBit();                    }
00099 
00109     PxBitAndByte    materialIndex1;
00110 };
